pycomms_pay.sms_package package

Submodules

pycomms_pay.sms_package.config module

pycomms_pay.sms_package.sms module

class pycomms_pay.sms_package.sms.Sms(account_sid, auth_token)[source]

Bases: object

A class to interact with the Twilio API for sending SMS messages.

Attributes:

account_sid (str): The Account SID for the Twilio account. auth_token (str): The Auth Token for the Twilio account. client (Client): The Twilio client used to interact with the API.

send_message(sender, receiver, body)[source]

Sends an SMS message using the Twilio API.

Args:

sender (str): The phone number or messaging service SID from which the message is sent. receiver (str): The phone number to which the message is sent. body (str): The content of the message to be sent.

Returns:

dict: A dictionary containing the SID and status of the message.

Raises:

Exception: If an error occurs while sending the message.
